alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 12:32PM CST until March 02 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cherokee County in southeastern Kansas... Northwestern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Western Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 115 PM CST. * At 1232 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Miami, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Joplin, Carthage, Webb City, Carl Junction, Baxter Springs, Columbus, Galena, Oronogo, Carterville, Duquesne, Duenweg, Diamond, Loma Linda, Cherokee, Airport Drive, Weir, Leawood, Lowell, Silver Creek and Alba. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 20. Interstate 49 between mile markers 25 and 38, and near mile marker 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
